00151 
00152         // Explanation of indexes:
00153         //              nLiqComps: a vector of 'nLiqPhases' items, each item is # of components in that phase
00154 
00155         //              ipIndex:   a vector of 'nLiqTotalComps' items, each item = phase index of this component
00156         //              icIndex:   a vector of 'nLiqTotalComps' items, each item = 'ith' RxnComp
00157         //              bHCIndex:  a vector of 'nLiqTotalComps' items, each item = 'is it HC?'
00158         //              ipmIndex:  a vector of 'nMinerals' items, each item = 'ith mineral + nLiqPhases'
00159         //              imIndex:   a vector of 'nMinerals' items, each item = 'ith mineral + nLiqUniqueComps'
00160         //              inoIndex:  a vector of 'nNonReactive' items, each item = 'ith item in nLiqTotalComps'
00161 
00162         GPRS::vector *nLiqComps;                // # of components in liquid phases
00163         GPRS::vector *ipIndexHelper;    //dim:[nLiqPhases]
00164         GPRS::vector *ipIndex;                  //phase index,                  dim:[nA];
00165         GPRS::vector *ipmIndex;                 //phase index mineral,  dim:[nMinerals]
00166         GPRS::vector *icIndex;                  //RxnComp index,                dim:[nA];
00167         GPRS::vector *imIndex;                  //RxnComp index mineral dim:[nMinerals] 
00168         GPRS::vector *bHCIndex;                 //isHydroCarbon index,  dim:[nA]
00169         std::vector<int> inoIndex;              //non-reactive comp index, dim:[nNonReactive]
00170
